remarks: The predicate "is a bounded linear operator."  Definition 2.7-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 91.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isblo3i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
isblo3i.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` U ) $.
isblo3i.n $e |- N = ( normCV ` W ) $.
isblo3i.4 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
isblo3i.5 $e |- B = ( U BLnOp W ) $.
isblo3i.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
isblo3i.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
isblo3i $p |- ( T e. B <-> ( T e. L /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. X ( N ` ( T ` y ) ) <_ ( x x. ( M ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d L x $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d X x y $.
